plan.summaryPrompt: You are an expert call analyst. Summarize this call in 2-3 sentences, focusing on the caller's main purpose, key discussion points, and any outcomes or next steps.
plan.structuredDataPrompt: You are an expert data extractor for business calls. Extract structured data from this call transcript focusing on lead qualification, customer intent, and business opportunities. Provide reasoning for your sentiment and lead quality assessments when possible.

leadQuality.description: Quality of the lead based on interest and urgency

keyPoints.description: Important points discussed during the call

followUpItems.description: Action items or follow-up tasks identified

urgentConcerns.description: Any urgent issues or time-sensitive matters

appointmentRequested.description: Whether the caller requested an appointment or meeting

timeline.description: Timeframe mentioned by caller (immediate, within a week, month, etc.)

contactPreference.description: Preferred method of contact (phone, email, text, etc.)

businessInterest.description: Specific business interest or service inquired about

budgetMentioned.description: Whether budget or pricing was discussed

decisionMaker.description: Whether the caller appears to be a decision maker

sentimentAnalysisReasoning.description: Brief explanation of why this sentiment was assigned based on conversation tone and language patterns.

leadQualityReasoning.description: Brief explanation of why this lead quality score was assigned based on engagement and interest signals.

plan.successEvaluationPrompt: Evaluate if this call was successful based on: 1) Did the caller get their questions answered? 2) Was relevant information exchanged? 3) Were next steps established? 4) Did the conversation flow naturally without technical issues?
